title: [Self-directed] Linking STEM Theory and Practice: Professional Development Through Supported Process Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts and practical experience in STEM education
context.additional_context: Utilization of mobile-friendly content and interactive tools optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three STEM theory-practice integration strategies.
Learners can design microlearning modules applying supportive process-oriented instructional methods.
Learners can develop case studies applying STEM theories to practical problems in their specialized fields (medicine/law/technology).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
